info.title: Information Recipient API's
info.description: API to fetch fuel prices and PFS station information, including incremental updates.

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 Client Credentials flow. First review the Access Token API, then generate a token and use it as Authorization: Bearer <access_token>.

get.description: API used to fetch all fuel prices.

parameters.name: batch-number
parameters.description: Batch number of fuel prices to fetch

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

get.description: API used to fetch all fuel prices incrementally based on the provided effective start timestamp.

parameters.name: batch-number
parameters.description: Batch number of fuel prices to fetch

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

get.description: API used to fetch all the PFS (Petrol Fuel Station) information. Note: Each API response returns data for up to 500 forecourts. To retrieve additional forecourts, the consumer must pass the query parameter `batch-number`. For example, the first call returns forecourts 0-500, and the second call with `batch-number=2` returns forecourts 501-1000.

parameters.name: batch-number
parameters.description: Batch number of fuel prices to fetch

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful
